column4: whats the prefered way to turn xubuntu into ubuntu?, clean one?
install ubuntu-desktop to get all the gnome programs, and ill get you a script in a sec to completely remove xfce
well, you'll need to use sudo like
Here's the link for the command to completely remove xubuntu leaving just gnome http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/puregnome
you may want to use sudo apt-get purge to remove all config files, your choice
thanks, but the reinstall is the best possible way?
apt-get purge will remove it just as clean as a re-install
lol ok :) be aware that the ubuntu-desktop package is quite big :)
and think about using apt-get purge, which will delete all the configs as well :)
program configs, things in /etc as far as I know. Could be worth googling first :)
